title: No, Video of Bottle Cap Challenge With Tank Is Not by Indian Army
subtitle: A video on Instagram posted by indian_defence_forces_ shows another version of the viral bottle cap challenge with a tank.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video on Instagram posted by indian_defence_forces_ shows a novel version of the viral bottle cap challenge using a tank.

The challenge which has taken the internet by the storm includes opening a bottle cap with usually a kick by the participant.

The post along with the video, which was posted on 20 July, said, "Tank bottle cap challenge😍😍jaihind 🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳. Please follow:@indian_defence_forces__ & Turn on post notification"

It also used hashtags "#india #indian #indianarmy #IndianNavy #indianairforce #aif #hal #army #armylife #love #raw #navy #specialforces #armystrong #armypower #world #top #motivational #specialday #taraning #awsome #best #ncc #itbp #bsf #indianmovies"
